YOUTUBE_DESCRIPTION:
In this episode of TattooNOW Weekly, we sit down with Tim O'Connor of 10K Foxes Queens Tattoo to discuss building an online presence that converts followers into booked clients. Plus, a deep dive into TattooNOW's business tools and how the Reinventing the Tattoo curriculum can level up your craft.

Topics Covered:
• Building Your Online Presence as a Tattoo Artist
• TattooNOW Business Management Tools & Longevity Platform
• Reinventing the Tattoo: 48-Week Course with Guy Aitchison
• Website Design & SEO for Maximum Bookings

Guest: Tim O'Connor (@10kfoxesqueens)
Style: Neo-Traditional & Japanese
Location: Queens, NY

Resources:
https://tattoonow.com
https://longevity.tattoonow.com
https://reinventingthetattoo.com
https://tattoogathering.com

#TattooArtist #TattooNOW #TattooBusiness #ReinventingTheTattoo #TattooMarketing

NEW EPISODE ALERT!

Join us TONIGHT at 7PM EST as we dive into digital marketing and business building for tattoo artists with Tim O'Connor of 10K Foxes Queens Tattoo!

Topics:
- Building a portfolio that books clients

Watch live: Facebook.com/TattooNOW
LINKEDIN_DESCRIPTION:
Tattoo artists: Are you leaving money on the table by ignoring your online presence?

In this week's TattooNOW Weekly, Tim O'Connor shares how he built a thriving multi-artist studio through strategic branding and the TattooNOW platform.

Key insights:
- Portfolio presentation that converts viewers to clients
- Studio management software that eliminates double-bookings
- The Reinventing the Tattoo curriculum for continuous growth

Whether you're a solo artist or studio owner, this episode is packed with actionable strategies.

Live tonight, 7PM EST.

SEGMENT_1_PORTFOLIO_IMAGES.description: Fistful of Fu Dog — Tim O'Connor

SEGMENT_1_DISCUSSION_TOPICS: Building 10K Foxes from a single chair to a multi-artist studio
How a TattooNOW website changed his booking flow overnight
Portfolio curation: what to show, what to cut
Running events and flash days to build community
Instagram vs. a dedicated portfolio site — why you need both
SEGMENT_1_DISCUSSION_GUIDE:
Tim O'Connor built 10K Foxes Queens Tattoo into one of NYC's standout shops through relentless portfolio curation and smart online strategy. In this segment, we explore how he uses TattooNOW's platform to showcase his team's work and keep the books full.

Key discussion points:
1. Going from a solo artist to managing a team — the business leap
2. How the TattooNOW gallery system (tattoos.gallery) presents work at its best
3. Running flash events like 'Fighting For The Title' and 'Sun, Fun & Tattoos' to pack the shop
4. The role of a professional website vs. relying solely on social media
5. Advice for artists who want to open their own studio

SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.title: TattooNOW Business Platform
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.subtitle: Tools Built by Tattooers, for Tattooers
keyPoints: Professional portfolio websites on tattoos.gallery
Automated social media posting & content scheduling
Intelligent calendar — prevents double-bookings
Built-in CRM with client history & follow-up
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.presenterNotes: Walk through the TattooNOW business platform. Show the tattoos.gallery portfolio system. Mention Gabe Ripley built this from decades of industry experience. Point viewers to longevity.tattoonow.com for details.

SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.title: Reinventing the Tattoo
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.subtitle: 48-Week Interactive Course with Guy Aitchison
keyPoints: Written chapters + webinars + recorded exercises each week
Live Monday Night Exercises via Zoom — every week
20+ art and tattoo-specific courses available
Guest instructors: Nick Baxter, Russ Abbott, Bob Tyrrell & more
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.presenterNotes: This is the flagship education product. Guy Aitchison started this in 1993 as a 3-ring binder. Now it's a full interactive platform. Enrollment opens 3x/year before each 16-week trimester. Mention the 7-day free trial. Point to reinventingthetattoo.com and classrooms.reinventingthetattoo.com.

SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.title: Webinars On Demand
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.subtitle: Learn from the Best in the Industry
keyPoints: Jeff Gogue — 'Size Doesn't Matter' Hand Tattoo ($150)
Bob Tyrrell — 'Method to My Madness' 10-Hour Epic ($149)
BJ Betts — Lettering Masterclass ($175)
Guy Aitchison & Jeff Gogue — CollabTattoo ($19.99)
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.presenterNotes: Highlight the webinar catalog. These are pre-recorded deep-dives from world-class artists. The CollabTattoo with Guy & Jeff is a great entry point at $19.99. Full catalog at tattoonow.com/professional-development/webinars-on-demand/. Play a clip of Jeff Gogue if time allows.

SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.title: Paradise Tattoo Gathering
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.subtitle: 4 Days of Responsible Tattoo & Art Education
keyPoints: Jiminy Peak Mountain Resort, Hancock, MA
Seminars, lectures, live critiques & paint jams
4 full-ride scholarships (travel, lodging, pass)
Art retreats with Shawn Barber & Nick Baxter
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.presenterNotes: Paradise Tattoo Gathering is the premier education event. Mention the scholarship program — 4 full rides including travel, lodging, airport transport, and guided tour. This is NOT a convention — it's focused entirely on education and community. Point to tattoogathering.com.

SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.title: Action Steps for This Week
keyPoints: Visit longevity.tattoonow.com — start your 5-day free trial
Browse reinventingthetattoo.com — check the course catalog
Watch the Guy & Jeff CollabTattoo webinar ($19.99 entry point)
Book a free 15-min business consultation with Gabe
Apply for a Paradise Tattoo Gathering scholarship
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.presenterNotes: This is the call-to-action slide. Encourage viewers to take ONE step this week. The free trial and the $19.99 webinar are the lowest-friction entry points. The consultation booking QR code should be visible.

SEGMENT_3_DISCUSSION_TOPICS: Common pricing mistakes tattoo artists make
How the Reinventing the Tattoo course changed Tim's approach
Building a waitlist instead of discounting
SEGMENT_3_DISCUSSION_GUIDE:
In the final segment, we open it up to live viewer questions and do a real-time website critique for one lucky attendee. Tim shares how the Reinventing the Tattoo curriculum shifted his approach to design, and Gabe breaks down the most common pricing mistakes he sees artists make.

Key discussion points:
1. Live Q&A — pull questions from chat
2. Website critique — pick a volunteer from the audience, walk through their site live
3. Pricing: why discounting destroys your brand (and what to do instead)
4. Tim's experience with Reinventing the Tattoo — what week was the biggest breakthrough?
5. Final thoughts: one piece of advice for artists watching tonight
BUMPER_MESSAGE: TattooNOW — Connecting Tattooers & Collectors Since the 90s
